attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop wasting time in court over a petty "habbit" or Nature. Licence brothels and keep the men and women save on our streets.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/abuse-brothels/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
